name: Vexed Heroes
description:
Welcome To Vexed Heroes!

Key Features Include:
5 Unlockable unique Heroes.
Level Up system featuring skill path's.
Endless New Game Plus scaling.
Endless permanent stat bonus progression.
2 Stages to play on.
Fun cute art.
And lot's of Violence!

This was a passion Project I have been working on for a long while to learn how to make games.
I hope you Enjoy it as much as I enjoyed working on it, I cant wait to make more!
